title: My goal this season is to help Paro FC win the championship
body_text:
Ritu Porna Chakma, 21, is a midfielder for the senior women’s national football team of Bangladesh. In 2024, she played for RTC FC in the AFC Women’s Champions League (Preliminary Stage).
